Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • magnate.logic.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Parameters

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parameters, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents the game where each player plays to and from.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Filipe

        public void set_players(java.lang.String p1,

        Parameters:

        p2 - name of the second player.

      • collect_tokens

        public void collect_tokens(int selected_token)
        This method adds tokens acording to the value of the dice and state of current card. 'player1_tokens' and 'player2_tokens' holds the tokens to be added to each player. 'cards' holds a Map with the information of the cards IN CONSTRUCTION and the player 'cards_constructed' holds a Map with the information of the cards CONSTRUCTED and the player 10 - Same as the begginig, 1 token for each crown, the operation is completed immediately (Works with Courts, they will NOT be rewarded because they have a value of 10) 2-9 - Checks for constructed cards, and the arrays will be filled in each cycle. If there is no cards IN CONSTRUCTION, the operation is completed immediately 1 - Checks for constructed and in construction cards, the operation is completed immediately
        Parameters:
        selected_token - the selected token, corresponding to the current card.

      • f_collect_tokens

        public boolean f_collect_tokens(int selected_token)

        Parameters:

      • build

        public void build(int card,
         int district,
         int[] token_number)
        Sets a builded card. Multiple tests are preformed, and then the card in set.
        Parameters:
        card - the number selected from the card at hand.
        district - the number of the selected district.
        token_number - an array of tokens, corresponding to each suit of the card.

      • f_build

        public boolean f_build(int card,
              int district,
              int[] token_number)

      • deed

        public void deed(int card,
        int district)
        Sets a card in deed. Multiple tests are preformed, and then the card in set. The player will be taxed with the same amount of suits of the card.
        Parameters:
        card - the number selected from the card at hand.
        district - the number of the selected district.

      • f_deed

        public boolean f_deed(int card,
             int district)

      • sell

        public void sell(int card)
        Sells a card. The selled card is put in the discarted pile. And the corresponding tokens are awarded.
        Parameters:
        card - the number selected from the card at hand.

      • f_sell

        public boolean f_sell(int card)

      • end_play

        public void end_play()
        This method draws a card, switches players, switches decks and verifys for the end game. Compares the points in the districts, the total number of ranks and tokens.

      • f_end_play

        public boolean f_end_play()

      • trade_tokens

        public void trade_tokens(int token_give,
                int token_receive)
        Trades 3 tokens of a kind for 1 of another.
        Parameters:
        token_give - the number of the token to remove from.
        token_receive - the number of the token to add to.

      • f_trade_tokens

        public void f_trade_tokens(int token_give,
                  int token_receive)

      • pay_deed

        public void pay_deed(int position,
            int token_type,
            int token_number,
            boolean graphics_mode)
        This method pays for a car in construction. Multiple verifications are performed. If completed the card is set to constructed.
        Parameters:
        position - the card to put in construction . (TextMode - The number of the card in construction) (GraphicsMode - The number of the district)
        token_type - the number of the token to be added.
        token_number - the number to add.
        graphics_mode - set graphics mode. (The card number is not calculated) (The token_type is not calculated)

      • f_pay_deed

        public void f_pay_deed(int position,
              int token_type,
              int token_number,
              boolean graphics_mode)

      • get_card_inconstruction

        public PlayCard get_card_inconstruction(int index)
        Gets the correct card from the given index. (This is needed because the user will only see the cards in construction, without taking into account the district) This method uses the function 'get_district_card' that also gives the district card, if that district is emply. This is why the verification ignores the card with rank 11, wich is the rank of district cards.
        Parameters:
        index - the index to search
        Returns:
        the card
